name: Super Hero Dress up Game Free
name_original: Super Hero Dress up Game Free
description:
Unleash the power of Super heroes. Young children will accomplish what they desire for creating their very own super heroes as the game allows them to mix and match the costumes of different characters and make the unique one. It will give the young kids more excitement and make them feel brave, fearless, in control of their world, outside of ordinary, and just plain good.

FEATURES

- Five different characters to dress up
- 14 Super hero costumes with endless possibilities of changing them with each other
- Lots of Colorful super hero backgrounds
- Characters make eye blink gestures
- Kids friendly interface
- Just lot of fun with soothing music

**Free version includes additional purchasing**
